---

# Project Template

Use this template for project or capstone pages.

## Objective

Define one measurable project objective.

- Business outcome: `[[target SMB result]]`
- Technical outcome: `[[tool/system capability]]`

## Problem and Scope

- Target user: `[[role/persona]]`
- Problem statement: `[[specific pain]]`
- In scope: `[[must build]]`
- Out of scope: `[[explicitly excluded]]`

## Milestones

1. `[[milestone 1 + due marker]]`
2. `[[milestone 2 + due marker]]`
3. `[[milestone 3 + due marker]]`

## Deliverables

- `[[working artifact]]`
- `[[documentation pack]]`
- `[[demo evidence]]`

## Rubric Summary

Reference the applicable rubric page and weighted criteria.

## Pass Criteria

- Minimum weighted score met
- Critical criteria meet floor
- Required deliverables complete and reviewable

## Hours

Estimated effort: `[[min-max hours]]`.

## Ship Checklist

- [ ] Scope delivered
- [ ] Evidence captured
- [ ] Rubric self-score attached
- [ ] Pass gate verified
